A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The themes of this movie: learning from failure and not being tied to the past\, were not subtle. Sledgehammer to crack nuts. The fakeouts got old very quickly and undermined the strength of some scenes entirely. \n\nToo many unresolved plots get brushed under the carpet. There is little to no consideration for the impact this film will have on other stories that share this setting. The hyperjump kamikaze scene is a notable example. This is not a film that plays well with others.
